title.rendered: The best Colorado rafting discount of the year!

content.rendered: Up to $163 off per person! Book between now and November 19 for a 2011 Colorado rafting trip and get 25% off! That's right, your eyes do not deceive you. It's never to early to start thinking about white water rafting in Colorado. Heck, as soon as we pack up the last raft of the season we're jonesin' for some more river time. (This terrificly extended  fall weather has had us thinking Colorado river rafting thoughts when the snow should really be falling…) So start planning your next Colorado summer adventure NOW! Use promo code 25raftdeal to book online. Call or email AVA Rafting for a quote at 800-370-0581 or info@coloradorafting.net. And don't miss our Colorado rafting website!
